cast.name: 里奇·史蒂夫斯 Rick Steves

introduction: Season 10 of Rick Steves' Europe debuted across the US on public television in the fall of 2018. Twelve new episodes include Portugal (Lisbon and the country's heartland), the heart of England, Greek islands, Sicily, and Scotland (Glasgow, Highlands, and islands). This season also offers a travel skills episode on cruising, and two special episodes on Europe's greatest festivals. In each episode, Rick explores the local culture, cuisine, and fun with local guides — all with an emphasis on inspiring and equipping American travelers to get out and experience these wonderful destinations on their own.Season 10 EpisodesEpisode 1001: The Heart of EnglandEpisode 1002: LisbonEpisode 1003: Portugal's HeartlandEpisode 1004: Travel Skills: CruisingEpisode 1005: Greek Islands: Santorini, Mykonos, and RhodesEpisode 1006: European Festivals IEpisode 1007: European Festivals IIEpisode 1008: The Best of SicilyEpisode 1009: Sicilian DelightsEpisode 1010: Scotland's HighlandsEpisode 1011: Scotland's IslandsEpisode 1012: Glasgow and Scottish Passions
